content: no-fuss shade-loving shawl by susan ashcroft this is very easy but effective my favourite type of knit it should be suitable for a patient novice but also relaxing for a more advanced knitter choose yarn with long runs of shading and let the yarn do the work for you the pattern also works well with stampingjoan handpainted or even textured yarn yarn and needles notes tips and abbreviations are you can use almost any yarn for given on page 2 a photo gallery can be this pattern because you start with 5 found on the last page - all photos are stitches and then increase to the credited to knitters ravelry names desired size some are listed below others used for the test knits can be found by clicking on the yarn ideas for the actual pattern you only tab on the pattern page on ravelry need to print pages 3-4 it s best to use a circular needle so you have room for all of the stitches but you don t knit in the round use a needle size which gives even gauge in stockinette stitch - or one size bigger if you want a looser knit lang tosca light - approx 100g with 5mm needles schachenmayr nomotta batiko - kaaatija approx 200g with 9mm needles © susan ashcroft - for personal non-commercial use only page 1 p notes and tips gauge for this pattern use a needle size which gives even gauge in stockinette stitch or one size bigger if you want a looser knit you can decide on the shawl size as you go or let the amount of yarn you have decide for you stitch markers you need to keep track of the middle stitch i just look for it but you may prefer to use stitch markers place one either side of the stitch so you can locate it on ws and rs row - or use a hook-type marker in the centre stitch quick fix if you find your stitch count is out when you get to the last yo and you don t feel like unpicking you can count the stitches on either side of the centre stitch and then work an extra decrease or increase before the yo to even up the sides this way you won t have to unpick and it probably won t be noticeable blocking depending on the yarn you choose you may not even need to block joining the yarn to keep a smooth edge i find it best to join the yarn between the yo s and the main section and then weave in the ends or you can splice abbreviations ws wrong side sewknitful rs right side k knit p purl yo yarn over needle k2tog knit 2 together knitwise seed stitch or moss stitch = k1 p1 xstmj © susan ashcroft -
